channel.title: Herblore exp from chest

item.title: Herblore exp from chest
item.dc:creator: @Project-Light Project-Light
item.description:
@Project-Light wrote:

[quote=“i str pk i, post:1, topic:391115”]Hey, i need a working code to gain herblore exp. if u click on it I dont understand this one =3 i added a chest ID but rest i cant figure out.
Please just take a quick look ty.

if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(100*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some herblore experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); }[/quote]

Umm Idk Much About This Sort Of Thing why not make item on item not item on object???

Read full topic
